title: ER Business Partner
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products they create the kind of wonder thats revolutionized entire industries. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it.
description: Identify, analyze and implement resolutions to complex and highly sensitive employee relations issues.
